name: Wider posts on Google Plus
description: This style alters the new Google Plus layout to make posts wider - about the width you'd expect from other fixed-width websites (~900px).
additional_info:
Updated 2014-03-28 14:40 PST - Additional selector for catching new posts button.
Updated 2013-10-05 11:55 PST - Modified rule for catching new posts button.
Updated 2013-10-05 9:04 PST - Remove a couple of old rules that were conflicting with new styles.

discussions.name: Makes Chrome much more usable in Firefox 21 and Chrome 27.
Problem with main stream being left justified
this is virtually a must-have for G+ enthusiasts
